00042 #ifndef __vtkParticle_h
00043 #define __vtkParticle_h
00044 
00045 #include "vtkParticleSpringSystemWin32Header.h"
00046 #include "vtkObject.h"
00047 
00048 class vtkSpring;
00049 class vtkSpringCollection;
00050 
00052 
00057 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkParticle : public vtkObject {
00058 public:
00059 
00061     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkParticle, vtkObject);
00063     static vtkParticle * New();
00065     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00066 
00068     vtkSetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);                     // Id
00070     vtkGetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00072     void SetMass(double mass);
00074     vtkGetMacro(Mass, double);                      // Mass of the particle
00076     vtkGetMacro(InverseMass, double);
00078     vtkSetMacro(Status, bool);                      // Fix particle
00080     vtkGetMacro(Status, bool);
00082     vtkSetMacro(Contacted, bool);                   // Contacted particle
00084     vtkGetMacro(Contacted, bool);
00086     vtkBooleanMacro(Contacted, bool);
00087 
00089     vtkSetVector3Macro(Position, double);
00091     vtkGetVector3Macro(Position, double);
00093     void AddPosition(double x, double y, double z);
00094 
00096     vtkSetVector3Macro(Velocity, double);
00098     vtkGetVector3Macro(Velocity, double);
00099 
00101     vtkSetVector3Macro(Acceleration, double);
00103     vtkGetVector3Macro(Acceleration, double);
00104 
00106     vtkSetVector3Macro(Force, double);
00108     vtkGetVector3Macro(Force, double);
00110     void AddForce(double f[3]);
00112     void AddForce(double x, double y, double z);
00113 
00115     void InsertNextSpring(vtkSpring * spring);
00116 
00118     void SetSpring(vtkIdType id, vtkSpring * spring);
00119 
00121     vtkSpring * GetSpring(vtkIdType id);
00122 
00124     bool ContainsSpring(vtkSpring * spring);
00125 
00127 
00130     void Update();
00131 
00132 
00133 protected:
00134     vtkParticle();
00135     ~vtkParticle();
00136 
00138     vtkIdType Id;
00140     double Position[3];
00142     double Velocity[3];
00144     double Acceleration[3];
00146     double Force[3];
00147 
00149     double Mass;
00151     double InverseMass;
00153     bool Status;
00155     bool Contacted;
00156 
00158     vtkSpringCollection * Springs;
00159 
00160 private:
00161     vtkParticle(const vtkParticle&);            // Not implemented.
00162     void operator=(const vtkParticle&);           // Not implemented.
00163 
00164 };
